'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Points of interest==
* The ruined office of Fleet Master Ko, now dead. You can find the [[Letter from Laeth√§rn]] in the desk and a plan for Fort Hasongo on the wall. [[Kaz]] sits on the floor.
title: Fleet Master's Office (Hasongo)
